arguments.arg: Please save it. This is visible only once. If you forget please regenerate token

kw.msg: ${Details} = Please save it. This is visible only once. If you forget please regenerate token

kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=userLogin, url=http://127.0.0.1:8001/api/v1/signupsrv/, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: POST Response : url=http://127.0.0.1:8001/api/v1/signupsrv/signup?name=guzI4I9m&passwd=tpopZsty status=200, reason=OK headers={'date': 'Wed, 24 Aug 2022 18:30:53 GMT', 'server': 'uvicorn', 'content-length': '124', 'content-type': 'application/json'} body="token: 41dae4cb07a1513e92bd225595cc76f7\n Please save it. This is visible only once. If you forget please regenerate token"

kw.name: Status Should Be
kw.doc: Fails if response status code is different than the expected.

kw.doc: Fails if ``container`` does not contain ``item`` one or more times.

This is visible only once."

kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=weatherSession, url=http://127.0.0.1:8080/api/v1/weathersrv/, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.doc: Sends a GET request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: GET Response : url=http://127.0.0.1:8080/api/v1/weathersrv/weather?token=7dfe9a86829c197dd88bd47d7a5beb28 status=200, reason=OK headers={'Server': 'nginx/1.23.1', 'Date': 'Wed, 24 Aug 2022 18:30:53 GMT', 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Content-Length': '5', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} body="Hot"

kw.name: Verify that weather is not returned if whitespace is entered
Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
